item.text: I maintain a part of [[Crypto Academy]] Federated Wiki which covers Basics of Blockchain Technology and its role in society through practical examples. It's purpose to popularise technology and principles of decentralised consensus. I am a contributor to [https://www.youtube.com/user/WorldCryptoNetwork World Crypto Network] podcast.
item.title: Ksenya

item.text:
As a member of Viral Academy my main intersests are in distributed team work and tools supporting it. 
I have a background in social science, and particulartly facinated the intersections of knowledge in society and information technology infrastructures.
item.title: Ksenya

item.text:
As a member of Viral Academy my main intersests are in distributed team work and tools supporting it. 
I have a background in social science, and particulartly facinated the intersections of knowledge in society and information technology infrastructures.
Stuff I am currently working on:
I am a lecturer at the Harvard School of Engineering and Applied Sciences and I conduct research on learning environments for engineering design.
item.title: Teaching Machines Sites

item.text: The [http://viral.academy Viral Academy] is a project to create a new [[Free Culture]] educational methodology based on [[Small Group Work]] and [[P2P Teaching]].
item.title: Viral Academy

item.text: Basic idea behind Real Space Academy is that learning is a social activity inseparable from day to day life.

item.text: Distributed Academy applies [[Federated Architecture]] to learning and [[Knowledge Management]] process.
item.title: Distributed Academy

item.text: Here is a

Filling application forms is a stressful and boring. Most of us are not professional fund raisers and don't intend to become that. We just want to build stuff valuable for our communities. We can do it with no money and no support only to a certain extent. Thats why, last winter we have started developing an idea of FormStorm.
item.title: FormStorm

item.text: FormStorm is a hackathon of forms - collective action for small projects and funders to come together, pitch, share, peer review and explore ideas, experience and areas of common interest
item.title: FormStorm
